response.overview: Johnny Love's sad that he's spending Christmas alone at home. However, his neighbor Cubbi Thompson and her friend Katalina Kyle have something else in mind. They want to sneak into his house to scare him. As they're sneaking in, Johnny begins to hear noises and quickly cowards in fear. Soon enough, he decides to man up and defense himself. Johnny sets up a set of traps around the house in order to catch the perpetrators. Little does he know, the perpetrators are some of the hottest girls imaginable. Upon realizing this, his mentality changes. After a brief interaction Cubbi, decides that she would like to spend Christmas with Johnny since she won't be spending it with her family either. From there, all three of them come together for a threesome that can only be described as Christmas miracle. Both girls take cock in several different positions making them cum several times before he busts a huge load all over their faces.
response.title: Hoes Alone
